item.title: Idris Elba, Rebecca Ferguson Face Nuclear Attack in Kathryn Bigelow’s ‘A House of Dynamite’ Trailer
item.description: The political thriller premiered this week at the Venice Film Festival ahead of its streaming launch next month.
